statements: UPDATE genetic_samples_metadata SET sample_name = 'Sample A', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sample_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
UPDATE genetic_samples_metadata SET research_topic = 'Genetics', location_collected = 'Lab' WHERE sample_name = 'Sample B';
UPDATE genetic_samples_metadata SET sample_name = 'Sample A', researcher_name = 'Researcher 1' WHERE sample_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE genetic_samples_metadata SET research_topic = 'Genetics', sample_description = 'This is a genetic sample' WHERE sample_name = 'Sample B';
UPDATE genetic_samples SET sample_type = 'Blood' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET lead_researcher = 'Dr. Jane Doe', project_name = 'Genome Sequencing' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE genetic_samples SET sample_type='Blood', collection_date='2022-10-15' WHERE sample_id=1;
UPDATE research_projects SET end_date='2022-12-31', lead_researcher='Dr. Smith' WHERE project_id=5;
UPDATE sample_metadata SET sample_type = 'Biology' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE researcher_info SET institution = 'University of Science' WHERE researcher_id = 3;
UPDATE research_project SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31', project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_metadata SET collection_date = '2023-05-15', researcher_id = 2, sample_type = 'Updated Sample Type' WHERE sample_id = 3;

UPDATE AnalysisResults SET result_summary = 'Positive for gene mutation' WHERE result_id = 1;

UPDATE AnalysisResults SET analysis_type='Genomic Sequencing' , result_summary='Detailed sequencing analysis completed' WHERE result_id=1;
UPDATE genetic_samples SET sample_name = 'New Sample Name', sample_type = 'Genomic DNA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET affiliation = 'New Affiliation', email = 'new.email@example.com' WHERE id = 3;
